title: Tour de France Femmes stage 6: Emma Norsgaard blitzes out of break after crash derails sprinters
content:
Chasing sprinters caught in pileup 900m out; US star Veronica Ewers crashes 50km out, loses almost ten minutes to GC favorites.

Read the full article at Tour de France Femmes stage 6: Emma Norsgaard blitzes out of break after crash derails sprinters on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
